list.title: Abhi ja Sanam
list.body: Raindrops pitter-pattered against the windowpane, a gentle rhythm that coaxed a sense of calm. Curled up with a well-worn book, the world outside seemed to melt away, replaced by the captivating story unfolding within the pages. A mug of cocoa, warm in her hands, sent tendrils of comfort through her. It was a perfect afternoon for getting lost in a good book.
list.author: Haider
